p.k: The Perfect Team / Falafel's Fun Day / 4 on 1 / Apple's in Trouble Onion worries his relationship with Apple is in jeopardy when a stray cat enters the picture. / When Falafel decides to pack up and leave the city, Apple and Onion have to convince him to stay or they'll have to leave too. / Onion's fear of crowds threatens his basketball team's success. / Apple is challenged to a fight by a grumpy Cheesesteak, so he and Onion go on a quest to find the source of Cheesesteak's grumpiness.
